title.rendered: CHARCOAL SHELLS IN MALAWI STEPS UP ACTION AGAINST ILLEGAL CHARCOAL TRADE (ANALYSIS)

content.rendered:
Coconut is a plant that is most often known and found in Indonesian society. The spread of coconut plants in almost all regions of the archipelago. Indonesian people will never be able to live without coconuts. Do your UKM friends know that Indonesia is the largest coconut producer in the world?

Unfortunately, with this superior volume of coconut production, Indonesia is still inferior to other countries in exporting coconuts, especially the Philippines. Many don’t realize that Indonesia has export power from this coconut. Moreover, many also do not know that all parts of the coconut tree can be processed. Let’s discuss the potential of Indonesian coconut in the export market.
